altername_name: Plus Belle la Vie 2: Le Mysterieux Passe de Vincent
name: Plus Belle la Vie 2: Le Mystérieux Passé de Vincent
overview: Plus Belle la Vie 2 is a continuation of the series, mixing intrigue and secrets but also friendships and meetings. Lead a new investigation and play as Leo, Nathan, Ninon and Samia to solve the new mystery of the Mistral.
